thread.title: Priyanka Chopra Makes Stunning A Debut At Golden Globes 2017
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra Makes Stunning A Debut At Golden Globes 2017

author: Koimoi.com Team
title: Priyanka Chopra Makes Stunning A Debut At Golden Globes 2017
text:
tweet Priyanka Chopra made a stunning debut on the red carpet of the 74th Golden Globe Awards in a golden glided Ralph Lauren gown with a plunging v-neckline. Priyanka, who will be presenting an award at the ceremony, found global popularity with American TV show “Quantico”. She is also set to make her Hollywood debut with “Baywatch” soon. With a touch of maroon hued lipstick, styled by Cristina Ehrlich, Priyanka posed for the shutterbugs confidently on the red carpet on Sunday, reports hollywoodreporter.com. . @priyankachopra and @JDMorgan take the stage to present the next award! #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/15TueiW4gx 
— Golden Globe Awards (@goldenglobes) January 9, 2017 Priyanka Chopra ‘glitters’ at Golden Globes 2017 Priyanka made stunning fashionable debuts at the red carpet of Oscars and Emmys last year. The other presenters at the gala includes names like Leonardo DiCaprio,Viola Davis, Sylvester Stallone, Chris Hemsworth, Brie Larson, Sofia Vergara, Zoe Saldana, Mandy Moore, Gal Gadot, Carl Weathers, Drew Barrymore, Matt Damon, Laura Dern, Goldie Hawn, Nicole Kidman, Diego Luna and Sienna Miller. Hosted by Jimmy Fallon, the Golden Globes is being held at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, California. SHARE
